content: My basil plant is doing much better now, thanks for asking. I've been keeping a close eye on it and making sure to harvest it regularly to promote healthy growth. I've also been using some of the techniques I learned from the workshop to improve its health, like making my own fertilizer from kitchen scraps. Speaking of kitchen scraps, I've started a compost bin about 6 weeks ago, and it's been amazing to see how it's helped reduce my waste output and create nutrient-rich fertilizer for my plants.
